Detailed Description

Provides a basic object interface.

Creates an interface for all objects that need to be updated and drawn. Used for lists of objects.

Member Data Documentation

bool iObject::deleteme

Delete flag.

Set to true for object to be cleaned up by whatever controls it.

Definition at line 17 of file iObject.h.

Referenced by iObject(), and cTPPickup::update().

GLfloat* iObject::modelviewmatrix

The current modelview transformation for the object.

Used when the object's global coordinates are needed, for example in collisions and such. Calculated when the object is drawn, since it will be under the modelview transformation by the time the control gets to the object's draw function.
